## Token.transfer() method

Transfer the specified amount of tokens to another wallet

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transfer(receiverAddress: string, amount: Amount): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  receiverAddress | string | The address to send the tokens to |
|  amount | Amount | The amount of tokens to send |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TransactionResult&gt;

the transaction result of the transfer

## Example


```jsx
const to = "...";
const amount = 1;
const tx = await program.transfer(to, amount);
```
